MS MCQs

    Define the foundation pillars of DevOps- Architecture and Technology

    »

    1. What’s the most important skill to have for 21st century success as a software architect?

      In-depth understanding of the Azure Service Fabric

      The ability to provision and encrypt data at rest in an Azure SQL database

      The ability to learn


    2. What does Conway’s Law state about the relationship between architecture and organization?

      The borders between architecture and organization are speed bumps on the information superhighway.

      System design is affected by the communications structures of the organizations that design the systems.

      The number of available technology tools in an organization is inversely proportional to its architectural hierarchy.


    3. What two characteristics in system/app architecture have the greatest impact on software delivery performance?

      Deployability and recoverability

      Sustainability and testability

      Testability and deployability


    4. Which of the following examples are modern Azure DevOps Services?

      Azure Boards and Azure Pipelines

      Azure Test Plans and Azure Key Vault

      Azure Artifacts and App Insights
